name: Magician's Scales (Skill Card)
skill_activation: Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
skill_effect: Once per Duel, you can Tribute 1 "Arcana Force" monster and add 1 Normal Spell from your Deck to your hand, also for the rest of the Duel, you cannot Summon any monsters, except "Arcana Force" monsters.
